message: Investigating bug affecting internal 'Galaxy Milk Tea Shaker' process.

incident.impactSummary: Potential errors or performance degradation related to the 'Galaxy Milk Tea Shaker' component.
incident.mitigation: Investigation ongoing to identify and patch the bug.
incident.detection: Reported internally or flagged by automated monitoring.
actionItems: Communicate user action requirement (rejoining the server).
Monitor user connection and data synchronization rates.
Monitor status of external Roblox API
Investigate potential temporary data caching solutions
Track user reporting and ensure data access is fully restored upon user rejoin.
Monitor Roblox status page for resolution.
Quantify total impact on downstream internal services.
Confirm stability of the rolled-back environment.
Monitor user rejoin rate and confirm restoration of data access.
Determine root cause of mobile pouring failure.
Develop and deploy fix for acknowledged bug.

timeline.event: System rollback pushed following unsuccessful fix attempt.
Confirmed root cause: External Roblox API down, preventing data access.
Rollback pushed and completed following a fix.
Report received that Roblox API dependency was unavailable.
Bug acknowledged: mobile pouring functionality confirmed not working.
Internal bug reported and investigation started.

communications.message: rollback status to degraded: Rollback has been pushed following a fix. Users must rejoin the server to restore access to old data.
Rollback has been pushed following a fix. Users must rejoin the server to restore access to old data.
Update received confirming Roblox API dependency failure as the primary issue.
set status to degraded Rollback has been pushed following a fix. Users must rejoin the server to restore access to old data.
